text: During the 2001–02 English football season, Gillingham competed in the Football League First Division. ==Season summary== Another satisfying season under player-manager Andy Hessenthaler saw Gillingham finish comfortably in 12th place despite many club rivals having better financial budgets to sign and pay players. ==Final league table== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align: center;"
